info.name: Flickr WideScreen - Pool No Beta - Small v.161a

Compact view for Poll no Beta :
Small thumbnails for less scrolling and faster explore a pool in Beta mode...
info.additionalInfo: â–¶ Important Notes: Waterfox Classic: Thumbnail load normally, just a problem with a page jumping. I can't solve it but it's usable (i prefer a smaller thumbnail and i use it always). NEW (2021.01) Seems against this jumping to top problem, i found a solution with an userscript! Read: Page keeps jumping to top when trying to scroll down thru Pool NO Beta - Solution by script the script to test: Don't fuck with my scroll!!! Firefox Quantum and Chrome: Seems there is a problem about thumbnail: They don't load totally (some stay Blank, don't know why...) It's why i removed the Small view from my : Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1) My Userstyles for Flickr on USO Archives (Faster and more usable than Userstyles.org): UserStyles.org Archive
